frame_fixes.name: Frame Fixes
frame_fixes.description: Records the players position every frame

frame_offset.name: Frame Offset
frame_offset.description: Adds a frame offset when recording or playing macros

ffmpeg_path.name: ffmpeg.exe Path
ffmpeg_path.description: The path for ffmpeg.exe, needed to use render.

show_trajectory_length.name: Trajectory Length
show_trajectory_length.description: How long will the Show Trajectory be.

editor_keybinds.name: Keybinds on editor
editor_keybinds.description: Enables keybinds while on the level editor.

restore_page.name: Restore Settings Page
restore_page.description: Saves the page you were in when you closed the menu.

show_trajectory_auto_play.name: Auto-play
show_trajectory_auto_play.description: Enables auto-play for the Show Trajectory.

show_trajectory_auto_play_clicker.name: Auto-play clicker
show_trajectory_auto_play_clicker.description: Enables auto-play clicker for the Show Trajectory.
